name: chai-assert-x
description: chai plugin to reverse expected and actual in assert syntax
author: Grant Snodgrass <meeber@gametypething.com>

scripts.build: npm run build-dist && npm run build-legacy
scripts.build-dist: npm run clean-dist && BABEL_ENV=default babel -d dist/ src/
scripts.build-legacy: npm run clean-legacy && BABEL_ENV=legacy babel -d legacy/ src/
scripts.clean: npm run clean-dist && npm run clean-legacy
scripts.postversion: git checkout dev && git merge master && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.preversion: git checkout master && git merge dev && npm test
scripts.test: npm run test-src && npm run test-dist && npm run test-legacy
scripts.test-src: BABEL_ENV=default mocha --require babel-core/register --require src/test/bootstrap/ src/test/ && npm run lint
